Translation: An old woman is sitting on a log

Primary_Text: Фаина солэсь умме усемзэ öз ни шöды
IPA: Fɑinɑ so-leɕ umm-e uɕ-em-ze ɘ-z ɲi ʃɘdɨ
Analyzed: Fɑinɑ	so-leɕ	umm-e	uɕ-em-ze	ɘ-z	ɲi	ʃɘdɨ
Gloss: Faina	3SG-ABL	dream-INE	drop-PTCP-ACC.3SG	NEG.PST-3SG	already	feel.CNG.SG
Translation: Faina didn't feel any more that/how she [Tamara] fell asleep
I saw a dog/a nice house

Primary_Text: Пи нылэз чупаз но бызьыса кошкиз
IPA: pi nɨl-ez t͡ɕup-ɑz no bɨʑɨ-sɑ koʃk-iz
Analyzed: pi	nɨl-ez	t͡ɕup-ɑz	no	bɨʑɨ-sɑ	koʃk-iz
Gloss: boy	girl-ACC	kiss-PST.3SG	and	run-CVB	go.away-PST.3SG
Translation: The boy kissed the girl and ran away

Primary_Text: Гуртын улыкуз, атае нюлэскы ветлылоз вал
IPA: gurt-ɨn ulɨ-ku-z ataj-e ɲulesk-ɨ vetlɨ-l-o-z val
Analyzed: gurt-ɨn	ulɨ-ku-z	ataj-e	ɲulesk-ɨ	vetlɨ-l-o-z	val
Gloss: country-INE	live-CVB-POSS.3SG	father-POSS.1SG	forest-ILL	go-FRQ-FUT-3SG	AUX
Translation: When my father lived in the country he used to go to the forest
When my mother came, I was eating

Primary_Text: Ми лыктыку со кошкемын ни вал
IPA: mi lɨktɨ-ku so koʃk-emɨn ɲi vɑl
Analyzed: mi	lɨktɨ-ku	so	koʃk-emɨn	ɲi	vɑl
Translation: S/he had already left before we arrived
I would live in the countryside if I could
If I baked a cake, I would eat it
S/he told what I should do
Soup is eaten with a spoon

Primary_Text: Мон мынӥсько Венгрие мадьяр кылэз дышетыны
IPA: mon mɨn-iɕko vengri-je mɑɟjɑr kɨl-ez dɨʃet-ɨnɨ
Analyzed: mon	mɨn-iɕko	vengri-je	mɑɟjɑr	kɨl-ez	dɨʃet-ɨnɨ
Translation: I’m going to Hungary in order to study Hungarian
Vasya lost the comb with which he used to clean the horse
the book which must be read
of the one that belongs to the village
Life without children is very sad
I’ll go out through the door
The water is very clear there
